He currently employs two people to help him and he is the leader of the group, which is called "C5684 Tuzamurane" in the local language. Jean Baptiste is the first person on the right hand side and has one year's experience in this business. 
He has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more Irish potatoes, beans and bananas etc to sell. With this profit, he expects to save money for his future and to pay for medical insurance for his family.

loans.use: To purchase more Irish potatoes, beans, bananas and so on.

loans.name: Makhwachanga Group

texts.en:
Elphas is the facilitator of the Makhwachanga group. Elphas and his group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Elphas takes care of nine children at home. He joined One Acre Fund due to One Acre Fund’s best prices and in order to ensure food security for his family. In the recent 2011 season, Elphas had a good maize yield harvesting 10 bags on ½ an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Elphas was only able to harvest 3 bags of maize on ½  acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Elphas and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from maize sales, Elphas will educate his children.

In 2012, the members of Makhwachanga group will each plant maize plots of between ½ and 1 acre of land.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Angelique

texts.en: Angelique is 32 years and has one child aged two. Her husband is a moto-taxi driver. She owns a general store which she has run for one year. Angelique would like a loan to buy rice, sugar, and other foodstuffs. The profits will be used to make savings for her future. She has a vision of one day owning a warehouse and selling things wholesale.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs to sell.

loans.name: Angayu W G Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Angayu W.Group in Western Kenya! Everlyne is the facilitator of the Angayu W.group. This  group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Everlyne takes care of one child at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Everlyne had a very good maize yield, harvesting 17 bags on 1 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Everlyne was only able to harvest 6 bags of maize on 1 acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Everlyne and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from maize sales, Everlyne will educate her child and invest in business and livestock rearing as future savings.

In 2012, the members of Angayu W. group will each plant  between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

The photograph shows Everlyne with her group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal ”SAN ANTONIO DE SAN SALVADOR”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de San salvador en la provincia de Pisac y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Daniel;  El socio tiene 34 años de edad, El socio es conviviente, El socio tiene 3 hijos de 12, 11, 1 año de edad; el socio trabaja en una empresa de saneamiento básico, y también tiene sus propios terrenos agrícolas, el socio produce quiwicha, quinua, maíz; El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar quiwicha.


El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Daniel, 34, belongs to the “San Antonio de San Salvador” communal bank located in San Salvador District in Pisac Province and Cusco Department.  He has a spouse and three children who are 12, 11 and 1 year old.  He works for a basic sanitation firm and also owns farmland.  He grows amaranth, quinoa and corn.  He requests the loan to buy amaranth seeds.  He is grateful for the loan and commits to make his payments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy amaranth seeds.

loans.name: Mikhailo

texts.ru:
Михайло женат, у него двое детей. Михайло живет в городе Хуст, Западная Украина. Он торгует недорогой обувью при входе на местный рынок. Конкуренции у Михайла особой нет. А вот товар пользуется спросом, есть своя клиентская база. Торгует обувной продукцией уже 8 лет. Более того, по субботам вместе с женой торгует птицей на рынке: продает курей, уток и гусей. 

Михайло хочет вложить кредит в 5 000 гривен в закупку дополнительного количества обуви для последующей реализации. Он поедет за товаром прямо на обувную фабрику, чтобы приобрести партию товара без всяких посредников. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Mikhailo is married with two children. Mikhailo lives in the town of Khoost in Western Ukraine. He sells inexpensive shoes at the entrance to the local market. He does not have much of a competition. His wares are in demand and he has his own customer base. Mikhailo has been selling showes for eight years. In addition, on Saturday he and his wife sell poultry at the market: chickens, ducks, and geese. Mikhailo would like to invest his loan of 5000 UAH into purchasing an additional stock of shoes for subsequent resale. He will travel to purchase shoes directly from the factory in order to buy his wares without any middlemen. Note: the case description is in Russian.

loans.use: to stock up on shoes for subsequent resale

loans.name: C9227 Abadahemuka Group

texts.en:
Beatrice is 39 years old and has four children, between 6 and 10 years old. She sells soap, sugar, rice, bananas and charcoal at her store, which is open from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day except on the weekends. 

She currently employs one person to help her. She is the leader of the group, which is called "C9227 Abadahemuka" in the local language. Beatrice is the first person on the right side. She has six years of experience in this business.  

Beatrice has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more soap, sugar, rice, bananas, charcoal, etc. to sell. With the profit, she expects to save money for her future and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more soap, sugar, rice, bananas, charcoal, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Athanasie

texts.en:
Athanasie is 56 years old and has 10 children between ages 21 and 32. She is a widow. She sells foodstuffs and vegetables in a store she has run for the last 12 years. 

Athanasie would like a loan to buy different types of foodstuffs. She would love to run a very large store in the future.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher lives in Mombasa, Kenya. He is married. He owns houses which he rents out. Christopher began his real estate business by using his personal savings to buy a piece of land. He then started building houses which he rents out. 

He is applying for a loan of KES 80,000 in order to renovate his rental properties. Christopher also owns a public service vehicle which plies inside Mombasa. His main challenge is the high cost of building materials. The income from this loan will enable him to save and develop other plots of land.

loans.use: To renovate the houses he rents out.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase gifts to sell for the festive season.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”SIRENACHAYOC”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Juana;  La socia tiene 44 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 2 hijos, La socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de especias; la socia tiene en el mercado su stand y le va muy bien, la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de mas especias para implementar su negocio; la socia implementara su negocio para mejorar sus ventas.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Juana, 44, belongs to the “Sirenachayoc” communal bank located in Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.  She has a spouse and two children.  She’s a spice merchant.  She has a stand in the market and she does very well.  She wants to use the loan to buy more spice to stock her business; she will stock her business in order to improve sales.  She is grateful for the loan and commits to make her payments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy more spices.

loans.name: C9216 Abizerwa Group

texts.en:
Console is 42 years old and has six children, between 6 and 21 years old. Her business is well-organized. She sells bananas and is the leader of the group, which is called "C9216 Abizerwa" in the local language. 

Console has one year of experience in this business. She has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more bananas to sell. With the profit, she expects to save money for her future and to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more bananas to sell.

loans.name: Victor

texts.ru:
Виктор женат, у него взрослые сыновья. Виктор живет и работает в Приветном. Он, как и многие его односельчане, занимается выращиванием ранних сельхозкультур: кабачков, помидор, перца, капусты и баклажанов. На 144 сотках Виктор выращивает 10 000 кустов помидор, 7 000 кабачков, 15 000 перца, 12 000 капусты и 12 000 баклажанов. Выращиванием овощей Виктор занимается уже 21 год. На данный момент в хозяйство уже вложено 160 000 гривен.  

Виктор планирует вложить кредит КИВА в 20 000 гривен в закупку удобрений, пленки, семян и химикатов для следующего сельскохозяйственного сезона. Виктор надеется удовлетворить спрос покупателей, эффективно реализовав свою продукцию и получив дополнительный доход от реализации овощей. Виктор планирует и в дальнейшем развивать свое дело, так как это не только дает ему возможность содержать семью, но и приносит массу удовольствия.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Victor is married and has grown-up sons. Victor lives and works in Privetnoye. He, like many of his fellow villagers, grows early crops such as zucchini, tomatoes, peppers, cabbage and eggplant. On the 144 acres Victor grows 10,000 tomato bushes, 7,000 zucchini, 15,000 peppers, 12,000 cabbages and 12,000 eggplants. Victor has been growing vegetables for 21 years. At this point he has 160,000 hryvna invested in his business.

Victor plans to invest the 20,000 hryvna Kiva loan to buy fertilizer, film, chemicals and seeds for the next agricultural season. Victor hopes to meet the demand of buyers, effectively sell his products and generate additional revenue from the sale of vegetables. He plans to further develop his business as it not only allows him to support his family, but also gives his enormous gratification.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, film, seeds, and chemicals for the upcoming agricultural season.

loans.name: Winifred

texts.en:
Winfred lives in the coastal town of Changamwe and has a salon that has been in operation for one year. She has employed one person in her current job. She is married and has four children, all of whom are in school.
 
Winfred is applying for a loan of KES 70,000 to purchase beauty products and appliances like a drier and hot combs. She looks forward to opening a state-of-the-art salon incorporating a training school and a beauty shop in the future.

Her main challenge is the high cost of rent, but she believes that through the additional income from this business, she will still be able to educate her children and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase beauty products and appliances like a drier and hot combs.

loans.name: Javo Welfare Group

texts.en:
Maina is the facilitator of the Javo Welfare group. Maina and his group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Maina takes care of eight children at home. He joined One Acre Fund due to One Acre Fund’s best prices and in order to ensure food security for his family. In the recent 2011 season, Maina had a very good maize yield, harvesting 18 bags on ½ an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund,  Maina was only able to harvest 9 bags of maize on ½  acres of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Maina and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from maize sales, Maina will educate his children.

In 2012, the members of Javo Welfare group will each plant maize plots of between ½ and 1 acre of land.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: C9251 Twitezimbere Group

texts.en:
Innocent is 23 years old and has one child who is 2 years old. He sells general items such as juice, milk, water, bread, bananas, Irish potatoes, etc. His store is open from 6 a.m. until 10 p.m. every day. He currently employs one person to help him. He is the leader of the group, which is called "C9251 Twitezimbere" in the local language. 

Innocent has five years of experience in this business. He has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his business by buying more juice, milk, water, bread, bananas and rice for sale. With the profit, Innocent will generate other business in different areas.

loans.use: To purchase more juice, milk, water, bread, bananas, Irish potatoes, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”SIRENACHAYOC”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Feliciana;  La socia tiene 65 años de edad, la socia es casada, La socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de animales menores, ella los cría y los vende, la socia compra cuyes y aves de corral y  como ya es muy conocida por las clientas la buscan y le piden un numero de cuyes por ejemplo 20 cuyes para una fiesta o reunión y ella los prepara y los cocina muchas veces o simplemente lo vende pelado. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores la socia comprara cuyes para la venta.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Feliciana, 65, belongs to the “Sirenachayoc” communal bank located in Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.  She is married and is a small farm animal merchant.  She raises them and sells them.  She buys guinea pigs and barnyard fowl and because she’s very well known among her customers she is sought out and orders are placed perhaps for 20 guinea pigs for a party or a get-together and she cooks them often and sometimes simply sells them butchered.  She is asking for the loan to buy small farm animals.  She will buy guinea pigs to sell.  She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments according to the timeline.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Yuryi

texts.ru:
Юрий женат, у него двое дочерей. Юрий с семьей живет в селе Подстепное, Цюрупинского района. Он занимается выращиванием ранних огурцов уже 10 лет. В свое фермерское хозяйство Юрий вложил 100 000 гривен.   

Юрию необходим кредит в 15 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить семена, пленку, химикаты, удобрения, дрова, уголь, а также покрыть транспортные расходы, связанные с установкой отопления в теплицах. За счет улучшения условий в теплицах Юрий сможет удовлетворить потребности покупателей, предоставляя им качественный товар, и получит дополнительную прибыль. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Yuryi is married and has two daughters. Yuryi and his family live in the village of Podstepnoye, in the Tsyurupynsk region. He has been growing early cucumbers for ten years. He has invested 100,000 hryvnia into his farm. 

Yuryi needs a loan of 15,000 hryvnia to buy seeds, plastic sheeting, chemicals, fertilizers, wood, coal, and to cover the transportation costs associated with installing heating systems in the greenhouses. By improving the conditions in his greenhouses Yuryi will meet his customers' needs by providing them with quality products, and he'll make an additional profit.

loans.use: to buy seeds, plastic sheeting, chemicals, fertilizers, wood, coal, and to cover the transportation costs associated with installing heating systems in the greenhouses.

loans.name: Leonille

texts.en:
Leonille is 37 years old and has three children, age 6 to 15. All of them attend school. Her husband sells meat. 

She sells fresh dairy, eggs, and snacks in a shop she has been running for eight years. 

Leonille would like a loan to buy more fresh dairy, eggs, and baking flour for her shop. The profits will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy fresh dairy, eggs and baking flour to sell.

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.en:
Jean Claude is 35 years old and is married with five children between the ages of 2 and 9. He owns a business of transporting people. This is his sixth successful year in this business, which is open from 6 a.m. until 8 p.m. every day. 

Jean Claude has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase materials (tires, mirror, engine) to help him in the business. Jean Claude hopes to earn more profits. With these profits, he will be able to build a secure future and he will be able to pay for medical insurance for his family.

loans.use: to purchase tires, a mirror and an engine to help him in his business.

loans.name: C 9297 Abiyubashye Group

texts.en:
Jean Bosco is 47 years old and has six children, between 3 and 16 years old. He sells beans and tea. His store is open from 6 a.m. until 5 p.m. every day. He currently employs three people to help him. He is the leader of the group, which is called "C 9297 Abiyubashye" in the local language. 

Jean Bosco has five years of experience in this business. He has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more beans and tea for sale. With this profit, he will pay his children's school fees and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase more beans and tea to sell.

loans.name: Volodimir

texts.ru:
Володимир – предприниматель из Ивано-Франковска. Он живет в городе вместе с женой и 10-летней дочкой. Володимир занимается пассажирскими перевозками по территории Украины. У него есть собственный автомобиль ГАЗ 31105, в котором стоит газобаллонное оборудование (метан).Транспортные услуги Володимир предоставляет уже на протяжении 2 лет. На данный момент его ежемесячный доход составляет около 6 000 гривен.  

Володимир планирует использовать сумму в 5 000 гривен для того, чтобы подготовить свое транспортное средство к зимним погодным условиям: приобрести зимние шины и сделать текущий ремонт ходовой части автомобиля. Этот бизнес является главным источником дохода для заемщика. Прибыль, полученную от бизнеса, Володимир хотел бы вложить в ремонтные работы в собственном доме.   
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Volodimir is an entrepreneur in Ivano-Frankivsk. He lives in the city with his wife and 10-year-old daughter. Volodimir drives a taxi in Ukraine. He has his own car, a GAZ 31105, which runs on methane. Volodimir has been driving a taxi for two years. Currently, his monthly income is about 6,000 hryvnia. 

Volodimir plans to use 5,000 hryvnia to winterize his car: to buy snow tires and to repair the suspension on the car. This business the primary source of income for the borrower. Volodimir would like to use the profit he makes to repair his home.

loans.use: to winterize his taxi

loans.name: Ivange

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  ”SIRENACHAYOC”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Ivange;  El socio tiene 26 años de edad, El socio es soltero, El socio trabaja en una empresa propia en el área de mantenimiento electrónico de las maquinas; la empresa produce pasteles, kekes, tortas, panes al por mayor y menor y el socio está encargado de todo el mantenimiento de las maquinas y ver la optimización de los mismos. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de algunos repuestos para mejorar la capacidad y la forma de operar de las maquinas.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Ivange, 26, belongs to the “Sirenachayoc” communal bank located in Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.  He is single.  He works for a firm in the machinery electrical maintenance area.  The firm manufactures baked goods at wholesale and retail and he is in charge of maintenance of all the machinery and must keep them in optimum condition.  He is asking for the loan to buy some spare parts to improve the capacity and operating efficiency of the machines.  He is grateful for the loan and commits to make his payments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Janette

texts.en:
Janette is 31 years old and single. 

She sells foodstuffs such as potatoes and peanuts in a store she has run for more than 8 years.  

The loan will be used to buy more potatoes to sell in her store. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy more Irish potatoes, green bananas and other food stuffs .

loans.name: Alina

texts.ru:
Алина – замужем, у нее двое детей. Алина занимается фермерским хозяйством в своем родном селе Водяное. Она выращивает ранние помидоры. У Алины шесть больших теплиц, где она ежегодно садит 7 000 высокорослых помидор. Сельским хозяйством она занимается уже 8 лет. В хозяйство было вложено около 150 000 гривен. Ежегодно затраты на семена и пленку составляют 55 000 гривен. 

Кредит КИВА в размере 14 000 гривен Алине необходим для того, чтобы провести отопление в теплицах. Алина очень бережно относится к посевам и поэтому вовремя старается предусмотреть все необходимое для того, чтобы уберечь будущий урожай от холодов: натягивает второй слой полиэтиленовой пленки и устраивает в своих теплицах отопление. Улучшение тепличных условий предоставит Алине возможность вовремя высадить овощи в необходимом количестве и получить соответствующую прибыль.   
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Alina is married and has two children. Alina is a farmer in Vodyanoye village. She grows early tomatoes. Alina has six large greenhouses, where every year she plants 7000 tall tomatoes. She has been working in agriculture for eight years. She has invested about 150,000 hryvnia in her harm. Each year, the cost of seeds and plastic sheeting is 55,000 hryvnia. 

Alina needs a Kiva loan of 14,000 hryvnia in order to heat the greenhouses. Alina is a very cautious farmer, and she is trying to provide everything necessary to protect her future crop from the cold, including using a second layer of polyethylene film and heating the greenhouse. Improving the conditions in the greenhouse will allow Alina to grow a greater quantity of vegetables and make greater profits.

loans.use: heat her greenhouses.

loans.name: C2876 Korandebe Group

texts.en:
Jeana Marie Vianney is 42 years old and has two children between 6 and 15 years old. He sells clothes from 6 am until 8 pm every weekday. He is the leader of the group called "C2876 Korandebe" in the local language. 

Jean Marie Vianney has 10 years of experience in this business. He has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company to expand his business by buying more clothes to sell. With the profit, he will build his own house and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To expand his business by buying more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Raquel Virginia

texts.es:
Raquel es socia del Banco Comunal “Ahorro es Progreso”  ubicado en el distrito,  provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene  45 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene cuatro hijos, dos independientes.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace más de seis años, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que incrementó en su negocio de venta de prendas de vestir.

Solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 3000.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invertirá en la  compra de  diez paquetes de prendas de vestir (chompas), la mercadería la compra en la Paz y la vende en la ciudad de Cusco, trabaja junto con su hijo y esposo.

Su sueño de la señora es tener su propio capital.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son los ahorros, el compañerismo la solidaridad con las socias y la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Raquel is a member of the “Ahorro es Progreso” communal bank located in Puno District, Province and Department.  She’s 45 years old, has a spouse and four children two of which are independent. 

She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for more than six years.  Her first loan was for 300 new soles that she used to increase her clothing sales business.  She will ask for a new, 3000 new sol, loan to buy ten bundles of clothes (sweaters).  She will buy the merchandise in La Paz and sell it in Cusco.  She works alongside her son and husband.  

Her dream is to have her own capital.  What she enjoys the most about her communal bank is the savings, the companionship and mutual support among her fellow members and the ease of the loan.

loans.use: to buy ten bundles of clothes (sweaters).

loans.name: Carmen Marcelina

texts.es:
Carmen es socia del Banco Comunal “Ahorro es Progreso”  ubicado en la  provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene  50 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene una hija.  Estudió educación superior.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace tres años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 200.00 nuevo soles dinero que incremento al capital de su negocio de venta de abarrotes.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 1,200.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invertirá en la compra de arroz, carne, verduras y pollos, para su respectiva venta, en el negocio le ayuda su hija.

Su sueño de la señora es tener una tienda grande de mercadería variada.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo  y los plazos de pago.
texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the “Ahorro es Progreso” (Saving is Progress) Communal Bank, located in the province and department of Puno. She is 50 years old and a single mother with 1 daughter, who studied higher education.

Carmen has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for the last 3 years. Her initial loan was for 200 new sols, which she invested in her business, a grocery store.

Now she is requesting a new loan for the sum of 1,200 new sols, to purchase rice, meat, vegetables, and chicken to sell. Her daughter helps her in the business.

Carmen's dream is to have a large store with varied merchandise. What she likes best about her communal bank is the ease of obtaining loans and the convenient repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, vegetables, and chicken to sell in her grocery store.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  ”SIRENACHAYOC”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Jose;  El socio tiene 57 años de edad, El socio es conviviente, El socio tiene 2 hijos de 23, 20 años de edad; El socio tiene su propia empresa, el socio produce maquinas selladoras eléctricas de bolsas plásticas, el socio inicio su empresa con una sola maquina y empezó a ver todo el manejo y la fabricación de la maquina y el hizo un par de maquinas en casa le fue muy bien el negocio por años y ahora el socio a perfeccionado sus maquinarias, ahora el socio fabrica con mejor tecnología y las pinta y tiene ya sus mesitas para apoyar y vienen mejoradas, el socio desea a futuro seguir creciendo y empezar a exportar fuera de Cusco sus maquinarias. El socio en esta ocasión desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de pinturas de metal para pintar el grupo de maquinas que ya tiene hechas y que fueron hechas a pedido de varios clientes.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Jose belongs to the “Sirenachayoc” communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Huanchac in Cusco province, department of Cusco.

Jose is 57 years old.  He has a live-in partner and 2 children, ages 23 and 20.  He has his own business that produces electric machines which vacuum-seal plastic bags.  He started his business with only one machine, and by observing how the machine was manufactured and how it operated he was able to build a couple of machines in his home.  His business has been going well for years, and he has perfected his machinery.  Jose now produces his machines with better technology and paint, and he has worktables to help with future improvements.  He wants to continue growing and to begin exporting his machines outside of Cusco.  

At this time Jose wants to invest the loan in the purchase of metal paints so that he can paint a group of machines that he has already built, which were made at the request of several customers.             

Jose is grateful for the loan and promises to make his payments in accordance with the re-payment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase metal paints.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
Guadalupe es socia del Banco Comunal “Ahorro es Progreso”  ubicado en la provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene  63 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos independientes.  Estudió educación secundaria.

Desde hace seis años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su préstamo anterior fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invirtió en su negocio de servicio de impresión, fotocopias y venta de útiles escolares.

Solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 1000.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invertirá en la compra de cinco cajas de papel bond, tóner para la maquina, también comprará útiles escolares.  Trabaja junto con su esposo.

La señora desea seguir con el negocio y ampliarlo ofreciendo otros servicios y más productos.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la unión con las socias, la facilidad del préstamo y la ganancia del ahorro.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is a member of the Communal Bank "Ahorro es Progreso" [Savings for Progress] which is located in the province and department of Puno. She is 63 years old, she is married and she has three independent children. She studied Secondary Education.

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the past seven years. Her previous loan was for the amount of 300 nuevo soles, which she invested in her business of providing printing and photocopying services and selling school supplies.

She is requesting a new loan for the amount of 1000 nuevo soles which she will invest in the purchase of five boxes of bond paper, toner for the printer and she will also buy school supplies. She works with her husband.

The lady wants to continue on with the business and expand it by offering other services and more products.

What she likes most about her Communal Bank is the closeness of the members, the ease of borrowing and the profits from savings.

loans.use: to buy five boxes of bond paper, toner for the printer and school supplies.

loans.name: C9298  Abakozi Group

texts.en:
Evode is 23 years old and is single. He sells beans and maize  from 6 am until 5 pm every weekday. He is the leader of the group called "C9298 Abakozi" in the local language. In the photo, Evode is the second person from the left.  He has 16 years of experience in this work. 

Evode has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company to purchase more beans and maize for sale. With the profit, he expects to save money for his future, pay his medical insurance and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase more beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is a farmer working in Trinidad, Bohol. She is a 47-year-old married woman with six children. 

Zenaida primarily grows rice crops to sell. She requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs.

Zenaida works hard to improve her business. She hopes for her family's living conditions to improve.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase germinating Irish potato seeds to plant.

loans.name: C8023 Abahujumugambi Group

texts.en:
Jeannette, a 33-year-old married mother of four children between the ages of 2 and 11, has a food-vending business which is open from 6 a.m. until 4 p.m. daily. In business for two years, she is the leader of a group which is called "C 8023 Abahujumugambi" in the local language.

Jeannette has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more beans, Irish potatoes, vegetables. etc. to sell. She will reinvest the profits in her business and save money for her future.

loans.use: to purchase more beans, Irish potatoes, vegetables,etc..

loans.name: C2193 Abadatenguha Group

texts.en:
Faustin is 36 years old and has three children between the ages of 3 and 10. He sells vegetable and fruit in his business. His business is well organized and he works from 7 am until 5 pm every day, except on the weekend. He is the leader of the group called "C2193 Abadatenguha" in the local language. Faustin has one year of experience in this work. 

Faustin has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his business by buying more vegetable and fruit for sale. With the profits he earns, he plans to save money for his future and to pay his children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables and fruits to sell.

loans.name: Marie Jeanne

texts.en:
Marie Jeanne is 32 years old and is married with two children aged two and fifteen. Her husband builds houses. 

She sells shoes and craft items in a store she has run for two years. She would like a loan to buy more used shoes to sell in her store. The profits will be reinvested in her business. She would love to have a whole-sale business in the future.

loans.use: To buy more used shoes to sell.

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es: La socia Bernardina, continua con su trabajo en el consultorio dental junto a su conyugue, la socia tambien  vende productos naturales, ella vende productos a base de hierbas medicinales naturales, la socia desea a futuro ampliar su consultorio dental e implementar sus productos naturales en vitrinas en el mismo local de su consultorio dental. En esta ocasion la socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de productos naturales para implementar su consultorio.
texts.en: The member, Bernadina, is continuing with her work in the dental office with her husband. The member also sells natural products. She sells natural herbal medicine based products. In the future, the member wants to expand her dental office and show her natural products in display cases, in the same location as the dental office. On this occasion the member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of natural products to supply her office.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of natural products to supply her office.

loans.name: C8029 Abishyizehamwe Group

texts.en:
Elina is 27 years old and is married. She has no children. Her business is well organized and she sells breads. Her business is open from 6am until 6pm every day. She currently employs two people to help her. 

Elina is the leader of the group which is called "C8029 Abishyizehamwe", in the local language. Elina is the first person in this line. She has five years of experience in this work. Elina has requested a loan from Kiva lenders, via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more breads to sell. With this profit, she will save money for her future, to pay her children's school fees and to pay medical insurance.

loans.use: to purchase more breads to sell.

loans.name: Maritza Luz Silvia

texts.es:
Maritza es socia del Banco Comunal “Ahorro es Progreso”  ubicado en la provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 39 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 niños, la señora cuenta con estudios de educación superior incompleto.

Maritza trabaja desde hace tres años con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que incrementó al capital de su negocio de venta de abarrotes, también vende carne vacuno.

Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,500.00 nuevo soles, comprará ochenta cajas de panetones de diferentes marcas, chocolates, leches y otros productos para abastecerce durante la campaña navideña.  En el negocio le ayudan sus hijos.

La señora desea tener un local propio y amplio para poner una bodega mucho más abastecida.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la organización, la puntualidad, la comprensión y el diálogo entre las socias.
texts.en:
Maritza’s a member of the “Ahorro es Progreso” communal bank located in Puno Province and Department.  She’s 39 years old and the single mother of two children.  She attended but did not complete higher education.

Maritza has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for three years.  Her initial loan was for 300 new soles.  She used the money to increase business capital selling groceries; she also sells beef.

She will use her new, 2500 new sol, loan to buy 80 boxes of panettones of various brands, chocolates, milk and other products to stock up during the Christmas season.  Her children help her in the business.

She would like to have a spacious locale of her own to set up a much better stocked store.  What she likes about her communal bank is the organization, the punctuality, the understanding and the dialogue among the members.

loans.use: to buy 80 boxes of panettones, chocolates, milk and other products for the Christmas season.

loans.name: Anitha

texts.en: Anitha is 36 years old with six children aged 2 to 16. She sells clothes such as skirts, blouses and sweaters.  The loan will be used to buy more skirts and sweaters to sell in her store. Any profits will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more skirts and sweaters to sell.

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es: Luz Elena de 33 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su compañero de vida. Luz posee una tiendita en la cual vende diversidad de artículos tales como: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, golosinas, aceite, detergente, etc. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse al negocio y gracias a Dios y a su dedicación a logrado mantenerlo activo por todo este tiempo. Ella es  muy emprendedora y sobre todo responsable ya que las metas que se propone siempre las alcanza con mucho éxito. Su sueño es ver su negocio florecer y lograr mejorar sus ingresos con el objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. De acuerdo a los anterior a tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su pequeña tiendita en la compra de mercadería (golosinas, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, detergente, café, leche, etc.) de tal forma que su tienda siempre tenga todo lo que los clientes buscan y así poder alcanzar su sueño de mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz Elena, 33, lives in her own house with her life partner.  Luz has a little store where she sells a variety of items like: rice, sugar, beans, snacks, oil, detergent, etc.  She’s been in business many years and thanks to God and to her dedication to it she’s managed to keep it in operation all this time.  She is very enterprising and above all very responsible because she always reaches the goals she sets for herself successfully.

Her dream is to see her business flourish and to improve her income in order to improve her and her family’s quality of life.  Therefore, she has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her small store buying merchandise for it (sweets, sugar, rice, beans, detergent, coffee, milk, etc.) so that her store will always have in stock everything her customers are looking for and she will be able to reach her dream of improving her quality of life that way.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: C 8025 Abishyizehamwe Group

texts.en:
Radisilas is 43 years old and has six children, aged between 3 and 10 years old. He sells cooking oil, sugar, beans, soap, etc. His business is open from 6am until 5pm every day. He is the leader of the group, which is called "C 8025 Abishyizehamwe" in the local language. 

Radisilas has twelve years of experience in this business. Radisilas has requested a loan from Kiva lenders, via Vision Finance Company, to expand his business by buying more rice, cooking oil, beans, soap and sugar to sell. With this profit, Radisilas will build his own house for his business and pay for his children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more cooking oil, rice, beans, soap, sugar and so on to sell.

loans.name: C9295 Twungukevuba Group

texts.en:
Patrick is 23 years old and is single. He owns a decoration business which is open from 8am until 8pm 30 every day. He currently employs one person to help him. He is the leader of the group, which is called "C9295 Twungukevuba" in the local language. 

Patrick has two years of experience in this work. Patrick has requested a loan from Kiva lenders, via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more material for the decoration business. With the profit, he expects to save money for his future and to pay his medical insurance.

loans.use: to purchase more material for decoration.

loans.name: Rosa Amanda

texts.es: Rosa Amanda de 36 años de edad, labora como docente de primaria en la Escuela Vigarmy Flores desde hace 21 años desempeñandose con gran responsabilidad y honestidad, su compañero de vida trabaja como agriculltor, ambos son bien trabajadores y comparten sus gastos familiares y los deberes crediticios ya que son una familia bien unida que trabajan para sacar adelante a su familia. Solicita  su 8vo credito para  reparar las paredes de su vivienda que se encuentran en mal estado y desea reforzarla repellandola, y de esta manera brindarle mejores condiciones  de vida a su linda familia, en su comunidad es bien conocida por ser una mujer de buen vivir y bien humilde, su sueño en la vida es  tener salud y estabilidad laboral para  ayudar a sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
Rosa Amanda is 36 years old and has worked as a primary school teacher at the Escuela Vigarmy Flores since she was 21. She has done so with great responsibility and honesty. Her life companion works as a farmer. Both are good workers and share family costs and loan responsibilities, and they are a close family who labor to advance themselves.

This will be Rosa's 8th loan for repairing walls at their home, which is in bad condition. They wish to reinforce them by plastering, providing better conditions of living for their lovely family. Rosa is well known in her community for living a good life and for her humility. Rosa's dream in life is to have good health and work stability in order to help her loved ones.

loans.use: to improve her home by reinforcing and plastering the walls.

loans.name: Luz Mila

texts.es: Luz Mila de 56 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo y sus tres hijos. Luz se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, creativa y sobre todo carismática. Tiene varios años de poseer un salón de belleza el cual con mucho  trabajo  y dedicación ha logrado mantenerlo activo por mucho tiempo y gracias a Dios  le ha proporcionado los ingresos necesarios para sacar adelante a su familia. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y por ella hace todo lo que esté en sus manos para contribuir con la economía de su hogar ya que cada día son más las necesidades que se presentan. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su salón de belleza ya que es lo más importante que ella posee y su deseo es mantenerlo activo por muchos más años. El crédito lo quiere invertir en la compra de artículos tales como: cremas, tintes, cosméticos, secadora, entre otros productos que ayuden a atraer a más clientes al negocio. De esta manera espera poder cumplir su sueño de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz Mila, 56, lives in her own home with her family, which includes her husband and her three children.  Luz describes herself as an enterprising, creative, and above all charismatic woman.

For several years she has had a beauty salon, which with much work and dedication she has managed to keep active for a long time.  And, with thanks to God, it has provided her with the necessary income to get her family ahead.  For her the most important thing is her family, and she does everything in her power to contribute to the household finances, since every day there are more necessities that come up.

She has made the decision to request this loan from Integral to invest in her beauty salon because it is the most important thing she possesses.  Her desire is to keep doing it for many more years.

She wants to invest the loan in buying such articles as creams, dyes, cosmetics, a dryer, and other products that help attract more customers to her business.  In this way she hopes to be able to realize her dream of improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy creams, dyes, cosmetics, a dryer, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Rosalia

texts.es:
Rosa Rosalía tiene 52 años de edad es soltera, vive con el papá y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC  SAN JUAN, Se encuentra Ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan se dedican a Labores Agrícolas.

Rosa se dedica a la agricultura hace ocho años, atiende una pequeña tienda. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Babahoyo. Solicita el crédito para sembrar cacao y darle el cuidado con abonos agrícolas.

El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder tener utilidades al momento de vender los productos en la tienda.
Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentemente es la competencia. El sueño de Rosa es poder apoyar a la familia económicamente y ver la salud del papá y los hijos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta arreglar la casa.
texts.en:
Rosa Rosalía is 52 years old, she is single and she lives with her dad and children in Cantón Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.

She is a member of the San Juan communal bank, located in the San Francisco area which is part of the parish of San Juan. They carry out agricultural work.

Rosa has been working in agriculture for eight years and she looks after a small store. She carries out the purchases and sales in Babahoyo. She is requesting the loan to sow cocoa beans and care for them with agricultural fertilizers.

The loan will be of great help to her, in making a profit from the sale of the products in the store. The challenge she regularly faces is her competition. Rosa's dream is to be able to support her family economically and ensure that her dad and the children are healthy.

In her free time she likes looking after the house.

loans.use: to sow cocoa beans and care for them with agricultural fertilizers.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto tiene 31 años de edad vive en unión libre no tiene hijos, vive con la esposa en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC  SAN JUAN, Se encuentra Ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan se dedican a Labores Agrícolas.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, maíz hace tres años. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Ventanas. Solicita el crédito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas, fertilizantes, abonos agrícolas.
El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder comprar las semillas sin ningún tipo de problema por el dinero.

Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentemente es la competencia y las plagas. El sueño de Carlos es tener terreno propio.
En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte..
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto is 31 years old and lives in a common-law relationship with no children.  He lives with his partner in Ventanas Canton, province of Los Ríos.

He is a member of San Juan Communal Bank, located in the San Francisco area of the parish of San Juan, where the people work in agricultural jobs.  Carlos has been working in agriculture growing rice and corn for three years.  He buys and sells in Ventanas.

He is requesting the loan to invest in agriculture, to buy seeds, fertilizer, and agricultural fertilizer.  The loan will be a great help to him so he can buy seeds without any money problems.

Competition and pests are the challenges he faces most frequently.  Carlos's dream is to have his own piece of land.  In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Lilliam

texts.es: La señora Liliam, es casada, desde hace 10 años trabaja como comerciante en su propio negocio donde vende productos como ropa, cosméticos,zapatos y otras cositas que su clientela le encargue. Está solicitando su primer crèdito para construir la cocina de su casa de habitaciòn, la cual esta en malas condiciones; cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que labora como mecanico y asume los gastos del hogar. El mayor deseo de Lilliam es poder ver bonita su casa con una cocina amplia y bien acondicionada, para que su familia se sienta a gusto en la casita que con tanto amor han hecho para ellos.
texts.en: Lilliam is married.  She’s been working as a merchant in her own business for ten years selling clothes, cosmetics, shoes and other things that her customers request.  She is asking for her first loan to build a kitchen in her home which is in poor condition.  She can count on support from her husband who works as a mechanic and takes on all the household expenses.  Lilliam’s greatest wish is to see her house pretty and with a spacious, well-furnished kitchen so that her family can feel comfortable at home which she’s formed for them with so much love.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to rebuild her kitchen.

loans.name: C9335 Abishyizehamwe Group

texts.en: Grace is 34 years old and has three children, aged between 4 and 10 years old. She owns a clothes business, which is open from 6am until 6pm every day. She is the leader of the group, which is called "C9335 Abishyizehamwe" in the local language. Grace has two years of experience in this business. Grace has requested a loan from Kiva lenders, via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more clothes to sell. With the profit, she expects to save money for her future, to pay her children's school fees and to renovate house.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for sewing.

loans.name: Reina Argentina

texts.es:
Reina Argentina tiene 38 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene dos hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 16 y dos años de edad en el Cantón ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC  SAN JUAN, Se encuentra Ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan se dedican a Labores Agrícolas.

Reina se dedica al comercio y a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, maíz hace 7 años. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San Juan. Solicita el crédito para tener como capital y comprar los insumos y semillas.

El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder comprar las semillas sin ningún tipo de problema por el dinero.
No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema. El sueño tener bien arreglado la casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta pintarse las uñas.
texts.en:
Reina Argentina is 38 years old and lives with her common-law husband and two sons who are 16 and 2 years old. She lives in the Ventanas region of Los Ríos. She is a member of the San Juan Community Bank located in San Francisco in the district of San Juan. The group members work in agriculture.

Reina has worked for seven years in commerce and farming rice and corn. She buys and sells in San Juan. She is asking for a loan to have for the capital needed to buy fertilizer and seeds. The loan will be of great help for her to buy seeds without any type of financial trouble. She has had no problems so far. Her dream is to have her house in good condition. In her free times she likes to paint her nails.

loans.use: get the capital to buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel de 33 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su madre. Miguel se dedica al comercio. Hace varios años que logró establecer una pequeña tiendita en la cual vende diversidad de productos tales como: pan dulce, golosinas, bebidas, aceite, huevos, arroz, etc. Miguel es un hombre emprendedor ya que no pierde oportunidad para echar andar sus ideas de negocio. Ha trabajado muy duro para mantener en marcha su pequeña tiendita y gracias a Dios ha logrado estar siempre un paso a delante de la competencia. Posee mucha experiencia en el negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes fijos que cada día lo prefieren más por ser un hombre honesto y dedicado en su trabajo. Ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio ya que su sueño es poder abarcar una mayor demanda de tal forma que pueda mejorar sus ventas así como sus ingresos que le permitan aspirar a una mejor calidad de vida. Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar artículos de tienda tales como: arroz, pan dulce, aceite, golosinas, huevos y de más productos que permitan atraer a más clientes de tal manera que pueda lograr su sueño de aumentar  sus ventas e ingresos así como su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Miguel Ángel is 33 years old and lives in his own home with his mother.  Miguel works in sales.  Many years ago he was able to open a small store where he sells a variety of products such as: sweet bread, candy, drinks, oil, eggs, rice, and more.  Miguel is an entrepreneurial man who doesn't miss out on opportunities to try out his ideas for business.  He has worked very hard to keep his small store going and, thanks to God, has been able to stay one step ahead of the competition.  He has a lot of business experience and has a lot of regular customers who grow to prefer his store because he is an honest man and is dedicated to his job.  He has decided to invest in his business because his dream is to be able to provide for greater demand so he can improve his sales and earnings and aspire to a higher quality of life.  For those reasons, he decided to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL, to buy merchandise for his store: rice, sweet bread, oil, candy, eggs, and other products that will allow him to attract more customers.  Then he will be able to achieve his dream of increasing his sales, his earnings, and his quality of life, as well as that of his family.

loans.use: buy rice, sweet bread, oil, candy, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Judith Roxana

texts.es:
Judith es socia del Banco Comunal “Brisas del Lago”  ubicado en la provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 36 años de edad, es conviviente  y tiene dos hijos, realizó estudio de educación superior.

Su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de abarrotes.  Actualmente se dedica a la confección y venta de vestidos de novia, bautizo, primera comunión y otros.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevo soles, comprará telas bordadas, americana y francés, para la fabricación de vestidos.  Realiza las compra en la ciudad de Lima. Judith trabaja junto con su esposo.

La señora desea tener su casa de novias donde pueda exhibir muchas más prendas y mejorar sus ganancias.
 
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones, el compartir con las socias y las bromas entre ellas.
texts.en:
Judith is a member of the "Brisas del Lago" ["Lake Breeze"] communal bank, located in the province and department of Puno. She is 36, lives with her partner, and has two children. She has a higher education.
Her first loan was for the sum of 300 nuevo soles, which she invested in her grocery business. She now works making and selling dresses for weddings, baptisms, first communions, and other events.
With this new loan of 3,000 nuevo soles, she will buy American and French embroidered fabrics for making dresses. She makes her purchases in the city of Lima. Judith works with her husband.
She wants to have a bridal shop where she will be able to display many garments and improve her sales.
What she most likes about her communal bank are the meetings; sharing with the members, and the little jokes that they make together.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of American and French embroidered fabrics.

loans.name: Roxana Carmen

texts.es:
Roxana es socia del Banco Comunal “Ahorro es Progreso”  ubicado en la provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene  33 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene una hija.  Cuenta con estudios de educación secundaria.

Trabaja desde hace un año con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de lencerías, aretes, joyas, pulseras, etc.

Su nuevo préstamo será de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de materiales como perlas, piedritas, pinzas, nailon, para la elaboración de sus pulseras, en el trabajo le ayuda su esposo a la vez trabaja en construcción.

La señora desea tener una casa,  desea mejorar el negocio y vender al por mayor.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las charlas educativas respecto al negocio.
texts.en:
Roxana is a member of the "Ahorro es Progreso" communal bank, located in the province and department of Puno. She is 33, lives with her partner, and has one daughter. She has a high school education.

She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was for the sum of 500 nuevo soles, and she invested it in her business selling lingerie, earrings, bracelets, jewellery, etc.

Her new loan is for 500 nuevo soles, which she will invest in materials such as pearls, stones, pins, and nylon. She will use these materials to make her bracelets. Her husband, who works in construction, helps her with her work.

She wants to have a house and improve her business. She also wants to sell wholesale.

What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the educational talks about business.

loans.use: to buy materials such as pearls, stones, pins, and nylon.

loans.name: Rosa Irlanda

texts.es:
Rosa Irlanda tiene 28 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene tres hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 11, 10 y 1 año de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC  SAN JUAN, Se encuentra Ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan se dedican a Labores Agrícolas.

Rosa se dedica a los quehaceres domésticos y a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao hace 1 año. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San Juan. Solicita el crédito para comprar matas de cacao y abonos agricolas, fertilizantes.
 
El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder comprar las semillas sin ningún tipo de problema por el dinero.
No se le presenta ningún tipo de problemas. El sueño es tener una casa.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a visitar a la familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Irlanda is 28 and in a common-law marriage. She lives with her husband and three children, ages 11, 10, and 1, in the Ventanas canton, Los Rios province.

She is a member of the San Juan communal bank, located in San Francisco, belonging to the San Juan parish. The group members work in agriculture.

Rosa does housework and works in agriculture. She has been sowing cocoa for one year. She makes her purchases and sales in San Juan.
She is requesting this loan for buying cocoa plants, manure, and fertilizers.

This loan will be a great help for her so that she can buy these items without having to worry about not having enough money.
She has not had any challenges thus far. Her dream is to have a house.
In her free time she enjoys going to visit family.

loans.use: to buy cocoa plants, manure, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Marcelina Antonia

texts.es: La señora Marcelina es casada, habita en la colonia san Juan, su principal fuente de ingresos es el comercio, tiene establecida una pulpería donde vende de productos basicos para el consumo familiar, la cual se encuentra ubicada en su casa, esta actividad le permite subsidiar sus necesidades y cubrir algunos gastos en proyectos utiles para el bien común de su familia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que también colabora con los gastos del hogar ya que el se dedica a realizar cultivos agricolas y en conjunto asumen responsabilidades; Marcelina necesita este financiamiento para invertirlo en compra de materiales de construcion ya que ampliara su cocina y quiere hacerle un pantry, lo cual le perpitira mejorar las condiciones en su vivienda. Desde ya agradece el apoyo que se le brinde para poder realizar y llevar a cabo dicha actividad, pues su casa es la herencia que dejara a sus hijos cuando ella falte y por eso quiere irla acondicionando poco a poco para dejarles un buen patrimonio.
texts.en:
Marcelina es married and lives in the San Juan neighborhood.  Her main source of income is commerce.  She has a grocery store where she sells basic family staple items located at home.  This activity makes it possible for her to meet her needs and cover some of the expenses in useful projects for the family’s mutual wellbeing.  Her husband helps her with household expenses since he’s a farmer and together they have taken on their responsibilities.

Marcelina needs the loan to buy building materials and supplies to enlarge the kitchen and add a pantry to improve her home’s condition.  She thanks you in advance for the support she’ll get to carry out this activity because her house is the estate she will leave her children when she’s no longer here and that’s why she wants to gradually improve it so that she can leave them a valuable inheritance.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase wood, nails, glue, polish, rush, etc.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en: Claudine is 23 years old with one child aged 3. She sells shoes in a store she runs. The loan will be used to buy more shoes to increase her inventory. Any profits will be used to renovate her house. She would like to one day be a wholesaler.

loans.use: To buy more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Esperanza Esther

texts.es:
Esperanza tiene 32 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con el esposo y con el hijo de 7 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC  SAN JUAN, Se encuentra Ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan se dedican a Labores Agrícolas.

Esperanza se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao hace 1 año y además tiene una tienda de abarrotes. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San Juan. Solicita el crédito para ampliar más la tienda, comprar abonos agrícolas para que este regio el cacao.

El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder comprar las semillas sin ningún tipo de problema por el dinero.

No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema El sueño  es seguir sembrando.
En los tiempos libres le gusta atender en la tienda.
texts.en:
Esperanza is 32, in a common-law marriage, and has one 7-year-old child. They live together in the Ventanas canton, Los Rios province.
She is a member of the San Juan communal bank, located in San Francisco, belonging to the San Juan parish. The members of this communal bank work in agriculture.
Esperanza has worked in agriculture, sowing cocoa, for one year. She also has a grocery store. She makes her purchases and sales in San Juan. She is requesting this loan so that she can expand her store more; she will buy manure to improve her cocoa.
This loan will be very helpful for her so that she can buy these tools without financial difficulty.
She has not had any challenges thus far. Her dream is to continue sowing.
In her free time she enjoys tending to her store.

loans.use: to expand her store more, and to buy manure to improve her cocoa.

loans.name: Rosa Jahayra

texts.es:
Rosa Jahayra tiene 21 años de edad evive en unión libre tiene 1 hijo, vive con el esposo y con el hijo de dos años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC  SAN JUAN, Se encuentra Ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan se dedican a Labores Agrícolas.

Rosa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao hace 2 años. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San Juan.

Solicita el crédito para  seguir trabajando en la agricultura comprar abonos agrícolas. Con el crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder comprar las semillas sin ningún tipo de problema por el dinero.

No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema El sueño  es tener un terreno.

En los tiempos libres le gusta realizar quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Rosa Jahayra is 21 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has one child. She lives with her husband and two-year-old son in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

Rosa is a member of the San Juan Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of San Francisco and part of the parish of San Juan. The members are farmers.

Rosa is a farmer who has been growing cacao for two years. She buys and sells in San Juan. Rosa is requesting a loan so that she can continue farming. She plans to buy compost. The loan will be a great help because the money will enable her to buy seeds without any problems. At the moment, she is not facing any challenges. Her dream is to have a plot of land.

In her free time, Rosa enjoys performing the household chores.

loans.use: to buy compost.

loans.name: C9249 Abadahemuka Group

texts.en: Drocella is 35 years old and has one child who is 10 years old. She sells bananas. Her business is open from 6am until 6pm every day. She is the leader of the group, called "C9249 Abadahemuka" in the local language. Drocella has two years of experience in this work. Drocella has requested a loan from Kiva lenders, via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more quantities of bananas to sell. With this profit, she expects to save money for buying the families food, to save money and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more quantities of bananas.

loans.name: Ignacia

texts.es:
Ignacia es socia del Banco Comunal “Ahorro es Progreso”  ubicado la provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene  67 años de edad, es viuda y tiene seis hijos.  La señora estudio hasta 2do de educación primaria.

Su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de alfajores y otras golosinas.

En la actualidad solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 2000.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra diez quintales de harina, tres bolsas de azúcar, cinco cajas de manteca, cuatro litros de leche y cinco bidones de gas, para la elaboración de los alfajores. En le negocio le ayudan sus hijos.

La señora desea continuar con el negocio y mejorar poco a poco sus ganancias.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la unión, la puntualidad, la ganancia del ahorro y los incentivos.
texts.en:
Ignacia is a member of the Communal Bank “Ahorro es Progreso” (Saving is Progress) which is located in the Province and Department of Puno. She is 67 years old, widowed, and has six children. Sra. Ignacia studied through the second grade.

Her first loan was in the amount of 300 PEN and the money was invested in her business of selling cookies and other types of sweets. She is currently requesting a new loan in the amount of 2000 PEN so that she can invest in the purchase of 10 quintales (1 quintal = 46 kg) of flour, 3 bags of sugar, 5 cases of butter, 4 liters of milk, and 5 tanks of gas so that she can prepare her cookies. Her children help with her business.

Sra. Ignacia wants to continue with her business and gradually improve her earnings. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the unity, the punctuality, the interest from her savings, and the incentives.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, butter, milk, and gas.

loans.name: Demetria

texts.es: La  señora  de Demetria,  nació  en el Torno  ella tiene 34 años  de  edad esta casada con el señor  Juan tienen  dos hijas  una  de  13  que se encuentra en edad escolar y  otra   de  6 años  de  edad que esta ingresando a la escuela,  la  señora Demetria se  dedica  a  la  venta  de  comida  en  su  mismo domicilio  por las  tardes se dedica a esta actividad   hace  cinco  años, su esposo  es  chofer  de un  hotel muy prestigioso de la ciudad de Santa Cruz Ella lo necesita  el crédito  para  poder comprar material de construcción, para  terminar  de refaccionar  su  pensión y ampliar  ya  que le va muy bien ya que tiene muchos clientes ya que la Sra. Demetria tiene buen sazón en el preparado de sus comidas y  ella desea darles comodidad a sus clientes, la Sra. Demetria es una persona amable,  muy buena y trabajadora, se siente feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan para crecer y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Demetria was born in El Torno. She is 34 years old and married to Sr. Juan. They have two daughters, ages 13 and 6, who are in school. Sra. Demetria sells food from her home in the afternoons and has been in this business for five years. Her husband works as a chauffeur for a very prestigious hotel in the city of Santa Cruz.

She needs a loan so that she can buy construction materials in order to finish the expansion and repairs to her diner. Demetria has done very well and has many customers as a result of the wonderful flavor of the food that she prepares. She wants her customers to be more comfortable.

Sra. Demetria is a friendly, good-natured, and hardworking individual. She is happy to have the opportunity to grow and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy construction materials so that she can repair and expand her diner.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz María tiene 26 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene una hija, vive con el esposo y con la hija de 4 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC  SAN JUAN, Se encuentra Ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan se dedican a Labores Agrícolas.

Luz María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, maíz hace 10 años. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San Juan. Solicita el crédito para  sembrar y comprar semillas, productos agrícolas. Con el crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder comprar las semillas sin ningún tipo de problema por el dinero.

No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema El sueño  es tener una casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta dedicarse a la hija.
texts.en:
Luz María is 26 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has a daughter. She lives with her husband and four-year-old daughter in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

Luz María is a member of the San Juan Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of San Francisco and part of the parish of San Juan. The members are farmers.

Luz María is a farmer who has been growing rice and corn for 10 years. She buys and sells in San Juan. The loan she is requesting will be used for her crops, so she will buy seeds and farming supplies. The loan will be a great help because the money will enable her to buy seeds without any problem. At the moment, she is not facing any challenges. Her dream is to have a house.

Luz María devotes her free time to her daughter.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farming supplies.

loans.name: Theogene

texts.en: Theogene is 41 years old and has five children between the ages of 1 and 11. Two of the children currently attend school. He has been selling chickens for 10 years. The loan will be used to buy more chickens. Theogene would like to use the profits to renovate his house.

loans.use: To buy more chickens to sell.

loans.name: Ananie

texts.en: Ananie is 31 years old and is married. He has one child. Ananie owns a boutique where he sells different kinds of body lotions, soaps, cooking oil,rice, soft drinks and so on. His business is well known and well organized and he has two years of experience in this business. Ananie has requested his first loan from Kiva, via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more quantities of soft drinks, body lotions, soap and cooking oil to sell. With this profit, Ananie will reinvest his profits in his business and save for his future.

loans.use: to buy more quantities of soft drinks, body lotions, soaps and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Fabiola

texts.es:
Sandra Fabiola tiene 21 años de edad es soltera tiene un hijo, vive con los padres y el hijo de 1 año de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC  SAN JUAN, Se encuentra Ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan se dedican a Labores Agrícolas.

Sandra se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, maíz hace dos años. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Ventanas. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para la meleza. 

El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder trabajar las tierras y comprar lo necesario.

Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentemente es la competencia y las plagas. El sueño es tener terreno propio.
En los tiempos libres le gusta ayudar a la mamá.
texts.en:
Sandra Fabiola is 21 years old, single, and has one child.  She lives with her parents and her one-year-old son in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

Sandra is a member of the San Juan Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of San Francisco and part of the parish of San Juan. The members are farmers.

Sandra is a farmer who has been growing rice and corn for two years.  She buys and sells in Ventanas.  The loan she is requesting will be invested in short-cycle farming.  The loan will be of great help because she can work the land and buy what she needs.  Among the challenges she faces on a frequent basis are the competition and pests.  Her dream is to have her own land.

In her free time, Sandra enjoys helping her mother.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and urea

loans.name: Francisco Eremi

texts.es: Francisco Eremi habita en la colonia los Laureles, junto a su familia que esta conformada por 6 miembros entre ellos 2 hijos mayores que aportan en los quehaceres del hogar. Francisco trabaja como Docente de primaria impartiendo el pan de la enseñanza a los niños de su comunidad, tambien es dueño de su pequeña unidad de produccion y su inventario ganadero lo que le permite maximizar las fuentes de ingreso a nivel familiar, su esposa también labora como docente y en conjunto asumen responsabilidades y gastos del hogar.  Esta solicitando  este financiamiento para invertirlo en compra de materiales  para la construccion de un cuarto que le permitirá mayor comodidad a su familia, y asi mejorar las condiciones en su vivienda desde ya agradece el apoyo para poder realizar y llevar a cabo dicha actividad.
texts.en: Francisco Eremi lives in the Los Laureles neighborhood with his family composed of six members among which are two adult children that help out with household chores.  Francisco works as an elementary school teacher imparting knowledge to children in his community; he also owns a small cattle herd that helps him maximize family income.  His wife also works as a teacher and together they are responsible for household expenses.  He’s asking for the loan to buy building materials and supplies for the construction of a room that will provide more comfort for his family thus improving their living conditions.  He thanks you in advance for your support to carry out this activity.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Tania Patricia

texts.es: Tania Patricia de 30 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Tenia se dedica al negocio de transporte escolar. Tiene varios años de realizar esta actividad y gracias a Dios los resultados obtenidos han sido muy favorables hasta el momento. Posee un microbús en el cual realiza  viajes a  estudiantes de diferentes centros escolares. Tania es una mujer increíble ya que es muy emprendedora, trabajadora y responsable.  Tiene muchos clientes fijos ya que ha sabido ganárselos gracias a su responsabilidad y dedicación en su trabajo. Últimamente ha notado que su microbús ha estado dando algunas fallas por lo que ha decidido invertir en algunas reparaciones. Para poder hacer lo anterior ha  decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en las reparaciones necesarias de su transporte ya que  es su herramienta principal de trabajo y este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos. Espera poder mejorar las condiciones de su transporte y poder prestar un mejor servicio con el objetivo de mejorar sus ingresos así como su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Tania Patricia is 30 years old and lives in her own home with her life companion and their two school-age children. She operates a school transportation business. Tania has been in business for several years. Thanks to God, she has obtained very favorable results to this point. Tania owns a minibus that she uses to transport students to different schools. She is an incredible woman who is very enterprising, hardworking, and responsible. Tania has several established customers who know that she is responsible and dedicated to her work.

Recently she has noticed that her minibus has experienced a few problems, so she has decided to invest in some repairs. Like she did before, Tania is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral to invest in the necessary repairs to her vehicle since it is the main piece of equipment in her business and an important source of income. By improving the condition of her vehicle, she hopes to provide better service so that she can generate more income to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle repairs.

loans.name: Joel Isidro

texts.es:
Joel Isidro tiene 32 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 7 y seis meses de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC  SAN JUAN, Se encuentra Ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan se dedican a Labores Agrícolas.
